welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Cano Martin Pena, Puerto Rico! Get ready to experience the vibrant culture and charm of our city, known for its beautiful beaches, delicious cuisine, and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Cano Martin Pena has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal for regional and commuter flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Terminal for cargo and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Isla Grande Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Isla Grande Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for passenger convenience.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and charter flights, providing exclusive services for a more personalized travel experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for passenger use.
